alert.note: Alert for Coastal Collier County; Glades; Hendry; Inland Collier County; Inland Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 5:54PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Collier, northern Hendry and southwestern Glades Counties through 700 PM EDT... At 554 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Clewiston to near Big Corkscrew Island. Movement was northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Clewiston, Labelle, Moore Haven, Ave Maria, Montura, Immokalee, Felda, Port La Belle, Devils Garden, Big Corkscrew Island, Ortona, Orangetree, Corkscrew Swamp Sanctuary, Lake Hicpochee, Bunker Hill, Harlem, Keri and Lake Trafford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Collier County; Glades; Hendry; Inland Collier County; Inland Palm Beach County
